nodes.label: Categorises individuals based on biometric data to infer sensitive attributes

question.prompt: Does the system categorise individuals based on biometric data to deduce or infer sensitive attributes (race, political opinions, trade union membership, religious/philosophical beliefs, sex life, sexual orientation)?

items.label: Recital (30)
items.text: Biometric categorisation deducing sensitive attributes should be prohibited; lawful labelling/filtering of biometric datasets (e.g., sorting by hair/eye colour) is not covered.
